pr_title: Update description of hibernate-orm-panache-common and google-cloud-functions-http to avoid duplicatetes

timeline.message: Update description of hibernate-orm-panache-common and google-cloud-functions-http to avoid duplicatetes

timeline.bodyText: This extension is unlisted so it should not make any difference
timeline.author: loicmathieu
timeline.diffHunk:

     <artifactId>quarkus-hibernate-orm-panache-common</artifactId>
     <name>Quarkus - Hibernate ORM with Panache - Common - Runtime</name>

+    <description>Hibernate ORM with Panache Common module</description>
